ourmission.content: Dong Sang Viet is made up of intelligent, united, and creative Vietnamese individuals working together to build a Vietnamese brand. Human values and personal development are the company's top priorities. Discipline and teamwork are highly emphasized, and everyone in the company must support each other to collectively develop, progress, and advance in a civilized manner. At Dong Sang Viet, our commitment to addressing and solving social issues is always central to our business activities, aiming to create a better life for the community. We have been and are providing educational support to children in difficult circumstances in remote rural areas of the country, fulfilling part of our social responsibility and changing the significance of education for these children. Established in early 2014, Dong Sang Viet has delivered a large volume of services to clients, supporting businesses both domestically and internationally across various fields and platforms. We pride ourselves on meeting the needs of our customers

product.title: How to customize application like we did
product.content: Custom software development essentially involves creating software tailored to meet the specific needs of a business model. Custom software development brings numerous benefits to businesses in terms of operations, production, and management: Meeting Specific Requirements: Each business has unique management and business models. Custom software helps businesses maintain tight control, manage, and operate more effectively by addressing their specific needs. High Data Security: With each business's unique requirements, developers must write complex code to ensure that the software meets the business's needs. Additionally, developers need to ensure the creation of a robust data security system for the client. Advanced Features: Custom software is designed to meet the specific demands of a business, improving interactions with customers and business partners, and optimizing internal management processes and business operations. Easy Software Maintenance: Since the software is designed to specifications, each piece of software has its own source code. Maintenance helps identify issues not discovered in previous software life cycles or allows for the upgrading and updating of new features, ensuring smooth and secure software operation.
